mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (mes_content, mes_me_receiverNum, mes_me_senderNum, mes_date, mes_readingCheck) VALUES (#{mes_content}, #{mes_me_receiverNum}, #{mes_me_senderNum}, NOW(), #{mes_readingCheck})
